scripts.start: concurrently --names "SHELL,SETTINGS,SHOP1,PUBSUB" -c "bgYellow.black.bold,blue.bold,magenta.bold,green.bold" "cd shell && npm start" "cd settings && npm start" "cd shop1 && npm start" "cd pubsub && npm start"
scripts.install: cd shell && npm i && cd ../shop1 && npm i && cd ../settings && npm i && cd ../pubsub && npm i
